summary.description:
A Simulator of Copy Number Variants and Whole-Exome Sequences from Reference Genomes.

A tool for simulating CNVs for WES data. It simulates rearranged genome(s), short reads (fastq) and BAM file(s) automatically in one single command.

SECNVs 2.7.1 (SimulateCNVs 2.7.1).

SECNVs (Simulator of Exome Copy Number Variants) is a fast, robust and customizable software application for simulating copy number variants and whole-exome sequences from a reference genome
summary.name: SECNVs
